#summary Class to bind a Implementation to an Interface


= Introduction =

To tell the DummyCreator which implementation of an interface you want to use, you need to use the InterfaceBinder.

= Howto Use =

To bind a Implementation to an Interface you use the following code:
{{{
    InterfaceBinder.bind(Interface.class, Implementation.class);
}}}

If you want for example use ArrayList as implementation of the List interface, you use this:
{{{
    InterfaceBinder.bind(List.class, ArrayList.class);
}}}
